title: Expression of Concern: Dexmedetomidine improves lung injury after one-lung ventilation in esophageal cancer patients by inhibiting inflammatory response and oxidative stress
content: Expression of Concern: Dexmedetomidine improves lung injury after one-lung ventilation in esophageal cancer patients by inhibiting inflammatory response and oxidative stress, Toxicology Research, Volume 13, Issue 2, April 2024, tfae041, https://doi.org/10.1093/toxres/tfae041
